name: Dust Universe
description:
An "old Browsergame style" Online Game in an 3D enviroment.

This is an 2 Man Project.

Greetings to my brother on this line he is an Coding genius.

No Bugfix at this moment! 

Here some Key nodes:

-You can choose your Faction

-You can Build 

-Upgrade and Unlock Buildings/Units

-Recruit Units

-Attack other Players and steal Ressources

-Attack  NPC Planet (Explorations)

-Recycle some Ressources after you loose against an Attacker

-Trade with other Players

-The game runs in Real Time even after you quit

At this moment 800 Players could take a "Planet Slot" There is no inactivity deletions at this moment.

Theoretically the Player Limit is bound to the Server performance.

That Stresstest make now sense to figure out whats the limit is :D

Was planed but not ingame jet.   :(

-Active Deffence Shield mechanic while you are "online" to encounter an incoming Attack

-Crew Recruit System where you can  group up and able to chat , give new Player a 1xTime Ressources Boost , Coordinated  attack against your Enemys where your Army can group up to a Big Fleet.  And no Trade restrictions.

-A Shield Protection after you get hard Attacked (some time to recover your Progress)

-unique Unit Strengh against other Types of Unit

-unique Factions Units/Unlocks/Buffs/Buildings

-Weekly Battle where you spend your Units to a Faction WAR to gain Rare Ressources Buffs for your Planet.

Professions to give your wanted Playstyle more Benefits.

Soldier for Attackers

Engineer for Building Upgrades and Productions effectivity

Deffender for your Planet Deffence and helping your Crew members.

The Game Development is actually "paused" but i never make a stresstest  to check the Server capacity.  Give me some Feedback may i will start on the Game again?

So let you warned at this point the Server may goes Offline at any time? The serverpayment still running even on "#Dev.break":O

The Game itself is playable on Mobile Android Devices and PC but only PC is uploaded at this moment.

I could upload an Android build but you have to install manualy on your device.

Its shared the same Universe for PC and Mobile Gamers.
